concept.title: DITA Information Types
concept.shortdesc: An introduction to DITA information types: Concept, Task, and Reference.

conbody.p: A fundamental principle of DITA is information typing, which categorizes information according to the nature of the content. The three base DITA information types are Concept, Task, and Reference.

li.p: Concept: Provides background information and explanations.
Reference: Describes features and sets of things.
